## HarFormatRequest.postData property

Information about the request body.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
postData?: HarFormatPostData;
```

## Remarks

kassette only includes this field if [saveInputRequestBody](./kassette.imock.saveinputrequestbody.md) is true (or, for the [\_kassetteForwardedRequest](./kassette.harformatentry._kassetteforwardedrequest.md)<!-- -->.postData field, if [saveForwardedRequestBody](./kassette.imock.saveforwardedrequestbody.md) is true).
